Text: Cheers Gary. Keep it up son!

Thanks! And thanks to all the seeders. You are all helping me out BIG time to upload the latest episodes at max speed (which is piss poor by my ISP- 80kb/s)!! Episode 5 should arrive (hopefully) by Monday morning (UK Time)!!!!!
thanx again gary for all your hard efforts hope ur ok mate

I'm great Daz! Besides, I know you got my back when people make stupid comments about stuff they don't like!! I showed a friend who loves TOWIE and she laughed her arse off!! Antiques Roadshow!! GOLD Brother!!!!!!!!

anytime mate  its so easy to criticise i hate people like that when sumone like u has spent so much time and effort to help others..if they dont like the show  dont watch it  its quite simple..it amazes me  all the time the number of people who hate shows  but spend half their life talking about them lol
